title: Bug 117981: Item selection issue in library outline view
description:
Description: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, the item cannot be selected on the first attempt. However, it can be selected on subsequent attempts. This issue is observed in the library outline view.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label to the library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item.

Expected behavior: The label item should be selectable on the first attempt in the library outline view.
OB: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, the item cannot be selected on the first attempt.
EB: On the second attempt, the label item can be selected in the library outline view.
SR:
1. Add a label to the library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item.
